Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT210 or ATI HD 7730
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
